Create or edit a trend section on a flowsheet

1 With a custom flowsheet selected in the main flowsheet configuration window, click Setup.

2 Click Trends to add a new trend section.

3 In the Section Title box, enter a title for the trend section. (This text will appear in the section header.)

4 In the Available Trends box, select a trend to add it to the section.

To create or edit a trend before adding it, see Create or edit a trend for use in any flowsheet.

(To delete a trend, select its name in the Available Trends box, and then click Delete.)

5 Click Close.

6 When you are finished configuring flowsheet sections, click OK.

7 Click Close.
